## Volcano - population Exposure Index

A comprehensive set of information on global volcanic hazard, historical events, population exposure, vulnerability, and impact has been provided to GAR15 by Global Volcano Model (GVM) and The International Association of Volcanology and Chemistry of the Earthâ€™s Interior (IAVCEI). This work is the first of its kind in global coverage and level of contribution from a wide network of experts and institutions around the world.https://data.humdata.org/dataset/volcano-population-exposure-index-gvm

```{r load data}
library(downloader)
url <- "https://data.humdata.org/dataset/a60ac839-920d-435a-bf7d-25855602699d/resource/e3b1ecf0-ec47-49f7-9011-6bbb7403ef6d/download/volcano.csv"
download.file(url, dest="data/volcano.csv") 
vol <- read.csv("data/volcano.csv")

```
```{r map}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet.extras)
risk3 <- vol %>% filter(risk=="3")
risk2 <- vol %>% filter(risk=="2")
risk1 <- vol %>% filter(risk=="1")
risk0 <- vol %>% filter(risk=="NULL")
m <- leaflet() %>%
        addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldImagery") %>% 
        addCircleMarkers(lng=risk0$Longitude,lat=risk0$Latitude,label = risk0$V_Name,
                         stroke = FALSE,fillOpacity = .8,fillColor = "purple",radius = 5
                         ) %>% 
        addCircleMarkers(lng=risk1$Longitude,lat=risk1$Latitude,label = risk1$V_Name,
                         stroke = FALSE,fillOpacity = .8,fillColor = "orange",radius = 6
                         ) %>% 
        addCircleMarkers(lng=risk2$Longitude,lat=risk2$Latitude,label = risk2$V_Name,
                         stroke = FALSE,fillOpacity = .8,fillColor = "yellow"
                         ) %>%

        addPulseMarkers(lng = risk3$Longitude,lat=risk3$Latitude,label = risk3$V_Name,
                        icon = makePulseIcon(heartbeat = 0.5))
m
```
